member.name: T:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions
member.summary: Static class containing Fluent extension methods.

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.EndOfDay(System.DateTimeOffset)
member.summary: Returns the very end of the given day (the last millisecond of the last hour for the given ).

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.BeginningOfDay(System.DateTimeOffset)
member.summary: Returns the Start of the given day (the first millisecond of the given ).

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.NextYear(System.DateTimeOffset)
member.summary: Returns the same date (same Day, Month, Hour, Minute, Second etc) in the next calendar year. If that day does not exist in next year in same month, number of missing days is added to the last day in same month next year.

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.PreviousYear(System.DateTimeOffset)
member.summary: Returns the same date (same Day, Month, Hour, Minute, Second etc) in the previous calendar year. If that day does not exist in previous year in same month, number of missing days is added to the last day in same month previous year.

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.NextDay(System.DateTimeOffset)
member.summary: Returns increased by 24 hours ie Next Day.

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.PreviousDay(System.DateTimeOffset)
member.summary: Returns decreased by 24h period ie Previous Day.

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.Next(System.DateTimeOffset,System.DayOfWeek)
member.summary: Returns first next occurrence of specified .

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.Previous(System.DateTimeOffset,System.DayOfWeek)
member.summary: Returns first next occurrence of specified .

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.WeekAfter(System.DateTimeOffset)
member.summary: Increases supplied for 7 days ie returns the Next Week.

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.WeekEarlier(System.DateTimeOffset)
member.summary: Decreases supplied for 7 days ie returns the Previous Week.

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.IncreaseTime(System.DateTimeOffset,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Increases the object with given value.

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.DecreaseTime(System.DateTimeOffset,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Decreases the object with given value.

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.SetTime(System.DateTimeOffset,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the original with Hour part changed to supplied hour parameter.

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.SetTime(System.DateTimeOffset,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the original with Hour and Minute parts changed to supplied hour and minute parameters.

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.SetTime(System.DateTimeOffset,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the original with Hour, Minute and Second parts changed to supplied hour, minute and second parameters.

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.SetTime(System.DateTimeOffset,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the original with Hour, Minute, Second and Millisecond parts changed to supplied hour, minute, second and millisecond parameters.

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.SetHour(System.DateTimeOffset,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns with changed Hour part.

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.SetMinute(System.DateTimeOffset,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns with changed Minute part.

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.SetSecond(System.DateTimeOffset,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns with changed Second part.

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.SetMillisecond(System.DateTimeOffset,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns with changed Millisecond part.

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.Midnight(System.DateTimeOffset)
member.summary: Returns original value with time part set to midnight (alias for method).

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.Noon(System.DateTimeOffset)
member.summary: Returns original value with time part set to Noon (12:00:00h).
member.returns: A value with time part set to Noon (12:00:00h).

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.SetDate(System.DateTimeOffset,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns with changed Year part.

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.SetDate(System.DateTimeOffset,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns with changed Year and Month part.

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.SetDate(System.DateTimeOffset,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns with changed Year, Month and Day part.

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.SetYear(System.DateTimeOffset,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns with changed Year part.

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.SetMonth(System.DateTimeOffset,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns with changed Month part.

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.SetDay(System.DateTimeOffset,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns with changed Day part.

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.IsBefore(System.DateTimeOffset,System.DateTimeOffset)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified is before then current value.
member.returns: true if the specified current is before; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.IsAfter(System.DateTimeOffset,System.DateTimeOffset)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified value is After then current value.
member.returns: true if the specified current is after; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.At(System.DateTimeOffset,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the given with hour and minutes set At given values.
member.param: The hour to set time to.
The minute to set time to.
member.returns: with hour and minute set to given values.

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.At(System.DateTimeOffset,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the given with hour and minutes and seconds set At given values.
member.param: The hour to set time to.
The minute to set time to.
The second to set time to.
member.returns: with hour and minutes and seconds set to given values.

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.At(System.DateTimeOffset,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the given with hour and minutes and seconds and milliseconds set At given values.
member.param: The hour to set time to.
The minute to set time to.
The second to set time to.
The milliseconds to set time to.
member.returns: with hour and minutes and seconds set to given values.

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.FirstDayOfMonth(System.DateTimeOffset)
member.summary: Sets the day of the to the first day in that month.
member.returns: given with the day part set to the first day in that month.

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.LastDayOfMonth(System.DateTimeOffset)
member.summary: Sets the day of the to the last day in that month.
member.param: The current DateTimeOffset to be changed.
member.returns: given with the day part set to the last day in that month.

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.AddBusinessDays(System.DateTimeOffset,System.Int32)
member.summary: Adds the given number of business days to the .
member.param: Number of business days to be added.
member.returns: A increased by a given number of business days.

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.SubtractBusinessDays(System.DateTimeOffset,System.Int32)
member.summary: Subtracts the given number of business days to the .
member.param: Number of business days to be subtracted.
member.returns: A increased by a given number of business days.

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.IsInFuture(System.DateTimeOffset)
member.summary: Determine if a is in the future.
member.returns: true if is in the future; otherwise false.

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.IsInPast(System.DateTimeOffset)
member.summary: Determine if a is in the past.
member.returns: true if is in the past; otherwise false.

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.FirstDayOfWeek(System.DateTimeOffset)
member.summary: Returns a DateTimeOffset adjusted to the beginning of the week.
member.returns: A DateTimeOffset instance adjusted to the beginning of the current week
member.remarks: the beginning of the week is controlled by the current Culture

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.StartOfWeek(System.DateTimeOffset)
member.summary: Obsolete. This method has been renamed to FirstDayOfWeek to be more consistent with existing conventions.

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.FirstDayOfYear(System.DateTimeOffset)
member.summary: Returns the first day of the year keeping the time component intact. Eg, 2011-02-04T06:40:20.005 => 2011-01-01T06:40:20.005

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.LastDayOfWeek(System.DateTimeOffset)
member.summary: Returns the last day of the week keeping the time component intact. Eg, 2011-12-24T06:40:20.005 => 2011-12-25T06:40:20.005

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.LastDayOfYear(System.DateTimeOffset)
member.summary: Returns the last day of the year keeping the time component intact. Eg, 2011-12-24T06:40:20.005 => 2011-12-31T06:40:20.005

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.PreviousMonth(System.DateTimeOffset)
member.summary: Returns the previous month keeping the time component intact. Eg, 2010-01-20T06:40:20.005 => 2009-12-20T06:40:20.005 If the previous month doesn't have that many days the last day of the previous month is used. Eg, 2009-03-31T06:40:20.005 => 2009-02-28T06:40:20.005

member.name: M:FluentDateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffsetExtensions.NextMonth(System.DateTimeOffset)
member.summary: Returns the next month keeping the time component intact. Eg, 2012-12-05T06:40:20.005 => 2013-01-05T06:40:20.005 If the next month doesn't have that many days the last day of the next month is used. Eg, 2013-01-31T06:40:20.005 => 2013-02-28T06:40:20.005

member.name: M:FluentDateTime.DateTimeExtensions.FirstDayOfYear(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Returns the first day of the year keeping the time component intact. Eg, 2011-02-04T06:40:20.005 => 2011-01-01T06:40:20.005

member.name: M:FluentDateTime.DateTimeExtensions.LastDayOfWeek(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Returns the last day of the week keeping the time component intact. Eg, 2011-12-24T06:40:20.005 => 2011-12-25T06:40:20.005

member.name: M:FluentDateTime.DateTimeExtensions.PreviousMonth(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Returns the previous month keeping the time component intact. Eg, 2010-01-20T06:40:20.005 => 2009-12-20T06:40:20.005 If the previous month doesn't have that many days the last day of the previous month is used. Eg, 2009-03-31T06:40:20.005 => 2009-02-28T06:40:20.005

member.name: M:FluentDateTime.DateTimeExtensions.NextMonth(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Returns the next month keeping the time component intact. Eg, 2012-12-05T06:40:20.005 => 2013-01-05T06:40:20.005 If the next month doesn't have that many days the last day of the next month is used. Eg, 2013-01-31T06:40:20.005 => 2013-02-28T06:40:20.005
